{"step_by_step_thinking": "Intraocular metastasis is the spread of cancer to the eye from another organ. The most common primary site for intraocular metastasis in females is the breast, not the gynecological organs. The breast is not a gynecological organ, but it is included in the list of options because it is a common site of primary cancer in women.", "answer_choice": "A. Breast"}
